text:
when i am seeing the xml file in the IE 5.0 then i am getting below error for 
the given tag:

<configProperties	
resourceresponsehash="AdminAction&0,System.default"
	policyextn=""
     	enableflag="true"     	
     	policyid="AdminActionManagement"     	    	
	/>

I am getting error: Name was started with an invalid character in 
resourceresponsehash line ... when i remove the Ambarsand "&" ... its going 
fine... can anyone tell me why this is happening .. the ambarsand is must there

waiting for the reply

Thanks in Advance

Regards

Seshadri

text: See XML Specs [2.4 Character Data and Markup]
